## jx start compliance

Starts compliance

### Synopsis

Starts compliance checking on an app

```
jx start compliance [flags]
```

### Examples

```
  # Start compliance
  jx start compliance <org/repo>
```

### Options

```
  -h, --help   help for compliance
```
